alert.note: Alert for Jones; Lyman (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jones and west central Lyman Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 529 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Wendte, or 18 miles south of Fort Pierre, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Jones and west central Lyman Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Aberdeen.
